name: SPACEBAR RESCUE
description:
Your space drinking buddies had a few too many at the SPACE BAR!

Fly your ship around the planets and follow the golden arrow to rescue them before they run out of oxygen!

Theme of the game: One Button

Credits

Game Programming by: Martin Bremer 

Game Art by: Me 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
